summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Lighting Department, accepting the offer of Associated Grocers, Inc. to purchase certain City (Lighting Department) property in the west half of the southwest quarter of Section 3, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M.; and, in exchange for the release of an adjoining transmission line easement, to grant the City a substitute easement for transmission line purposes and to pay the City's costs of relocating the transmission lines.
